alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hamilton; Madison; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Madison, northern Delaware, Hamilton and eastern Tipton Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Elwood, or 15 miles northwest of Anderson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elwood. This includes Interstate 69 near mile marker 206, and between mile markers 239 and 252. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
